requirementText.description: The @csip:OTHERTYPE attribute must be used for stating the general type of the package (genre) when @TYPE has the value “OTHER”. **See also:** Content information type declaration: http://earkcsip.dilcis.eu/#VocabularyType

testCase.description: If @TYPE = "OTHER" then @csip:OTHERTYPE: - MUST exist - MUST have a string value stating the general type of the package (genre) - MUST NOT have a value from the VocabularyType as defined in http://earkcsip.dilcis.eu/schema/DILCISVocabulariesIP.xml because these vocabulary values MUST be used for attribute @TYPE.

error.message: mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE attribute does not exist. MUST be: if @TYPE = "OTHER" then @csip:OTHERTYPE attribute MUST exist and have a value.

package.name: mets-xml_mets_csip-OTHERTYPE_attribute_not_exist
package.description: METS.xml file with @TYPE = "OTHER" but no @csip:OTHERTYPE attribute.

package.name: valid_minimal_mets_TYPE_is_OTHER
package.description: Minimal folder structure and root METS.xml. mets/@TYPE = "OTHER", @csip:OTHERTYPE has a meaningful value.
